summary: We reviewed active duty female servicemember retention and promotion in FY 2004-2018. The proportion of women in the military went up from 15.1% to 16.5% Attrition rates for female enlisted and commissioned officers were higher than for males, but this gap has narrowed Women were 28% more likely to leave the service than men Promotion rates for enlisted were slightly lower for women than men...
title: Female Active-Duty Personnel: Guidance and Plans Needed for Recruitment and Retention Efforts
